Abstract

In this blog, common linear algorithms [Match Filter(Maximum ratio)、Zero Forcing、Minimum mean-square error ] will be presented in detail with different perspectives.

Introduction

s

The linear MF criterion is optimal for maximizing the received SNR in the presence of additive stochastic noise. The linear ZF criterion is optimal for maximizing the received signal-tointerference ratio (SIR). By contrast, the linear MMSE criterion based detector is optimal amongst all linear detectors in terms of achieving the MMSE, and in essence it is also optimal for maximizing the received signal-to-interference-plus-noise ratio (SINR) amongst linear detectors.
